markdown.content: Okay, finally purged all the reblogs and replies from Tumblr's downloadable unzipped archives which cannot be to backed up [GitHub](https://github.com/ZaryaTheLaika/Tumblr), [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/ZaryaTheLaika) or mirrored [Pillowfort](https://www.pillowfort.social/ZaryaTheLaika) nor Cohost for copyright reasons.

It's about 175 posts (out of 447). Not all of them will be mirrored to Pillowfort and Cohost since there are Tumblr-specific posts which makes no sense out of context. But they will be backed up on GitLab and GitHub.

Kind of disappointed most of the best materials are adding to other people's blog posts. Oh well. Looking forward to seeing how people on the other sites contribute with their own unique cultures. Only duplicating the content because I don't really trust Matt Mullenweg nor Automattic Inc. with Tumblr's future after finding out he's associated with a16z.
